item.title: At Least 38 Killed as Gunmen Ambush Shiite Convoys in Pakistan
item.description: The attack was one of the deadliest in months of violence between Sunnis and Shiites in the Kurram region.

item.title: Who Has the ICC Charged With War Crimes?
item.description: The short list includes Omar Hassan al-Bashir, the deposed president of Sudan, and President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia.
